<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Analyze Information](/Feats.aspx?ID=2483) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can stoke your mind into a burst of analytical prowess. You can cast 3rd-level [_hypercognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=156) once per day as a divine innate spell.
name: Analyze Information
